C4illin/ConvertX

Self-hosted file converter, 1000+ formats

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Self-hosted file converter for images
  • Converts images to modern formats like JPEG XL and AVIF
  • web app for converting files and processing images
  • Automates backups for remote storage with encryption and compression
  • automates file library optimization and format conversion
  • Converts files, performs OCR, and transcribes audio in a browser
  • video converter for making files MP4 or MKV from other formats
  • PDF to machine-readable formats converter
  • GUI for H.264, HEVC and AV1 encoding
